tasks.title: ğŸ“… Daily: Extract Tasks from Calendar & Email
tasks.description:
Recurring task to pull actionable items from Google Calendar and emails into Mission Control.

**Schedule:**
- â° 8am: Daily (via OpenClaw cron)
- ğŸ” Scans next 36 hours
- ğŸ“‹ Creates tasks with auto-generated subtasks
- âœ… Uses MCP integration (Zapier)

**What gets extracted:**
- Google Calendar events (meetings, deadlines)
- Emails with task keywords (task, to-do, due, deadline, meeting, appointment, reminder)
- Meeting prep tasks
- Follow-up tasks

comments.author: Molty
comments.text: Cron job created. MCP integration implemented via mcporter + Zapier.

tasks.title: Restaurant Ideas
tasks.description: Send me a message with some dinner options for me and my wife. The location should be 20m drive or less

comments.author: Molty
comments.text:
Dinner options for Adam & Heather (within 20min drive from Peachtree Corners):

**UPSCALE OPTIONS**

ğŸ½ï¸ **StÃ¤ge Kitchen & Bar** (Peachtree Corners - 5 min)
- Steaks, seafood, pasta, global tapas & elevated sushi
- Live music, craft cocktails, indoor & patio seating
- Upscale but relaxed atmosphere

ğŸŒŠ **Peche Modern Coastal** (Peachtree Corners - 5 min)
- Modern coastal cuisine with seafood focus
- Also serves steaks, fresh pasta, pastries
- Beautiful decor, extensive wine list
- Great for a date night

ğŸ‡¯ğŸ‡µ **Sei Ryu** (Peachtree Corners - 5 min)
- High-end Japanese with omakase service (reservations only)
- Chef-driven, 15+ years experience
- Four distinct dining areas including rooftop patio
- Perfect for special occasions

comments.author: mccargo21
comments.text: These are good ideas. Let review more asian options and update the list here.

comments.author: Molty
comments.text:
Added 4 Asian restaurant options to the list:
- Sei Ryu (high-end Japanese with omakase)
- Wonder Pho (Vietnamese)
- 26 Thai Kitchen (fast-casual Thai)
- Kimchi Red (Korean fried chicken)
- Pearl Lian (pan-Asian fusion)

Moved to in_progress to action the feedback.

tasks.title: Research weekend trip ideas
tasks.description: Let's explore road trip or cheap flights for me and my 2 boys (9 and 5). We are in atlanta and want to do a long weekend (Feb 12-16)ish. Give me some options under 6 hour drive or 3hr flight (under $160each tix). Take into account cool events or festivals going on.

comments.author: Molty
comments.text:
## ğŸ–ï¸ Weekend Trip Research Results
**Atlanta Area | Feb 12-16, 2026 | You + 2 boys (9 & 5)**

### ğŸš— Driving Options (Under 6 hours)

#### 1. ğŸ–ï¸ Savannah, GA *(4 hours)*
- Historic cobblestone, pirate history, ghost tours
- **Forsyth Park** - playgrounds, splash fountain
- **Savannah Children's Museum** - interactive exhibits
- **Trolley Tours** - hop-on/hop-off, kids love it
- **River Street** - candy shops, street performers
- **Winter festivals** downtown Feb 12-16
- **Cost:** $200-400 total

#### 2. ğŸ”ï¸ Gatlinburg/Pigeon Forge, TN *(4 hours)*
- Mountains, attractions, nonstop family fun

**Pigeon Forge:**
- **Dollywood** - rides, shows, seasonal events
- **WonderWorks** - interactive science museum
- **The Island** - shops, fountain shows, Ferris wheel

**Gatlinburg:**
- **Gatlinburg SkyLift Park** - mountain views, tubing
- **Ripley's Aquarium** - sharks, touch pools
- **Arts & Crafts Loop** - local artisans
- **Cost:** $300-500

#### 3. ğŸŒŠ Panama City Beach, FL *(5-6 hours)*
- Beach, dolphins, laid back
- **Pier Park** - mini golf, restaurants
- **Shell Island** - boat shuttle to pristine beach
- **Dolphin Tours** - kids love seeing them in wild
- **Cost:** $250-450

### âœˆï¸ Flight Options (Under 3 hours, <$160/person)

#### 4. ğŸ° Orlando, FL *(1.5hr flight, ~$80-140)*
- Disney, Universal, ICON Park
- **Epcot International Festival** (check 2026 schedule)
- **Disney Princess Half Marathon** weekend (usually Feb)
- **Highlights:** Disney World, Universal Studios, ICON Park
- **Cost:** $120-200/person flights + $200-400 hotels

#### 5. ğŸ· New Orleans, LA *(1.5hr flight, ~$90-150)*
- Culture, food, riverboats
- **Mardi Gras Parades** (Feb 17, 2026 = Fat Tuesday!)
- **Highlights:** Audubon Zoo, Children's Museum, Streetcar rides
- **Cost:** $100-160/person flights + $150-250 hotels

#### 6. ğŸ›ï¸ Washington, DC *(2hr flight, ~$100-150)*
- Museums, monuments, FREE attractions
- **Presidents Day Weekend** (Feb 15-16, 2026 - PERFECT!)
- **Highlights:** Smithsonian Air & Space, National Zoo, Monuments
- **Cost:** $120-150/person flights + $200-300 hotels

### ğŸ¯ Top Recommendations

**ğŸ¥‡ Best Value & Fun:** Savannah, GA
- Under 4 hours, historic, walkable, kid-friendly

**ğŸ¥ˆ Best Timing:** New Orleans, LA  
- Mardi Gras Feb 17 - perfect pre-celebration
- Cheap flights, kids love energy

**ğŸ¥‰ Best for Ages:** Orlando, FL
- 9yo is prime Disney age, 5yo can do most things

**ğŸ† Best Adventure:** Gatlinburg, TN
- Mountains + attractions, close drive

### ğŸ’¡ Notes
- Flight prices are estimates â€” check Google Flights for Feb 12-16
- Winter offseason = low rates (except Orlando)
- Weather varies: beach (mild), mountains (cold), cities (moderate)
